mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ADM_POP_INFO A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.POP_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT A.POP_ID , A.POP_TITLE , TO_CHAR(A.EXPO_BGN_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EXPO_BGN_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.EXPO_END_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EXPO_END_DTTM , A.PAR_ROW_POS , A.ROW_POS , A.POP_KIND , A.EXPO_YN , A.LINK_URL , A.LINK_KIND , A.POP_CONTS , A.DEL_YN , A.REGR_ID , A.UPDR_ID FROM ADM_POP_INFO A WHERE A.POP_ID = #{popId}

SELECT POP_ID ,APND_FILE_SEQ ,APND_FILE_SZ ,APND_FILE_ORGN ,APND_FILE_NAME ,APND_FILE_PATH ,DEL_YN FROM ADM_POP_APND_FILE B WHERE POP_ID = #{popId}
AND APND_FILE_SEQ = #{apndFileSeq}

SELECT A.POP_ID , A.USER_DIV , A.USER_ID , A.DEL_YN , A.REGR_ID , A.REG_DTTM , A.UPDR_ID , A.UPD_DTTM , CASE WHEN A.USER_DIV = 'DPT' THEN C.DEPT_NAME WHEN A.USER_DIV = 'EMP' THEN B.USER_NAME ELSE A.USER_ID END AS DISPLAY_NAME FROM ADM_POP_USER_MAP A, PSN_USER_INFO B, PSN_DEPT_INFO C WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID (+) AND A.USER_ID = C.DEPT_CODE (+) AND A.POP_ID = #{popId}
